pr_title: OAuth Scim Service - Issue 769 - change password regex

timeline.message:
Changed password regex and added tests, code formatted + organize imports using STS IDE

Changed password regex and added tests, code formatted + organize imports using STS IDE

timeline.bodyText:
the last part to prevent spaces is incorrect, you need (?=\S+$),
^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[^a-zA-Z0-9])(?=\S+$).{8,64}$
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Replacing \\ with \ gives compilation error - Invalid escape sequence (valid ones are  \b  \t  \n  \f  \r  \"  \'  \\ )
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

timeline.bodyText: please also add a test where length > 64
timeline.author: zohrehj
